title: 你们一般中午在那里吃饭？
author: wdsjwzzz
txt_content:
本帖最后由 wdsjwzzz 于 2014-1-20 12:24 编辑 

第一句话：本帖大水。。不喜勿看。。管理看不过去的可以删掉。但跪求别封号。。
我：放假，百分百是电脑桌跟前吃饭。。

replies.txt_content: 我坐在椅子上吃饭！

replies.author: lxsd
replies.txt_content: --！我可以说，我经常在家里的WC里吃饭吗？

replies.author: 岩浆害人
replies.txt_content:
在家吃饭。


我妈不在就和电脑吃

replies.author: wq57
replies.txt_content: 在地球上吃饭

replies.author: chenziang
replies.txt_content: 餐桌上，我是学生

replies.author: cyqsimon
replies.txt_content: 我去全家买了两个饭团，现在电脑面前吃......

replies.author: 龌龊大大
replies.txt_content: 我在餐桌吃

replies.author: wdsjwzzz
replies.txt_content:
lxsd 发表于 2014-1-20 12:28 
--！我可以说，我经常在家里的WC里吃饭吗？
味道一定很好。。

replies.author: ever-lose
replies.txt_content: 在地球上的某地

replies.author: 末影卐
replies.txt_content:
wq57 发表于 2014-1-20 12:28 
在地球上吃饭
在中国吃饭.......

replies.author: 末影卐
replies.txt_content: 电脑前边刷分边吃饭

replies.author: 500对开
replies.txt_content: In home or In my grandfather house

replies.author: wdsjwzzz
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 wdsjwzzz 于 2014-1-20 12:49 编辑 
500对开 发表于 2014-1-20 12:46 
In home or In my grandfather house

你英语没学好。纯粹中式英语
在LZ的菊花里吃午饭

replies.author: MC大湿
replies.txt_content:
529907746 发表于 2014-1-20 12:49 
在LZ的菊花里吃午饭


QAQ 肯定有一股翔气！

replies.author: linzhan
replies.txt_content: I eat at a certain place in the world..............................

replies.author: 我勒个去234567
replies.txt_content:
在家吃饭
但心在电脑跟前

replies.author: 我勒个去234567
replies.txt_content:
500对开 发表于 2014-1-20 12:46 
In home or In my grandfather house
home是副词，前面不能加介词in

replies.author: 丶司宸
replies.txt_content: 当然是床上
